short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Find top Basketball sites and get direct access to web search on your new tab page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Basketball Fan Tab is a great new tab extension for your Chrome browser!
 
• Quickly and easily navigate to the best Basketball websites
• Find the latest scores and headlines using Basketball Fan Tab’s built-in search function directly from your new tab experience
• Navigate to top email and social websites with a single click
 
EULA: http://infospace.com/downloadable/terms/terms-of-use.html
 
Privacy Policy: http://infospace.com/downloadable/terms/privacy.html
 
You can uninstall this extension at any time.
